title: Videos from Sudan’s killing fields reveal ethnic hatred behind massacres
content: Sudan’s Darfur region was the scene of a genocide two decades ago. Exclusive videos shared with The Post show the inflamed bigotry behind a new wave of killings.
summary: Sudan’s Darfur region was the scene of a genocide two decades ago. Exclusive videos shared with The Post show the inflamed bigotry behind a new wave of killings.

title: Israeli snipers again face scrutiny after death of civilian
content: Witnesses say the Israel Defense Forces fatally shot Aysenur Eygi, a 26-year-old American volunteer in the West Bank. The IDF said it was “looking into reports that a foreign national was killed as a result of shots fired in the area.”
summary: Witnesses say the Israel Defense Forces fatally shot Aysenur Eygi, a 26-year-old American volunteer in the West Bank. The IDF said it was “looking into reports that a foreign national was killed as a result of shots fired in the area.”

title: Edmundo González, likely winner of Venezuela election, flees to Spain
content: González fled days after the attorney general for Venezuela’s authoritarian president, Nicolás Maduro, filed a warrant for the arrest of the former diplomat.
summary: González fled days after the attorney general for Venezuela’s authoritarian president, Nicolás Maduro, filed a warrant for the arrest of the former diplomat.

title: Philippine celebrity pastor arrested in human trafficking, sex crime case
content: Philippine police have captured Apollo Quiboloy, the Kingdom of Jesus Christ megachurch founder who is also wanted by the FBI on charges of sex and human trafficking.
summary: Philippine police have captured Apollo Quiboloy, the Kingdom of Jesus Christ megachurch founder who is also wanted by the FBI on charges of sex and human trafficking.

title: Gunman kills 3 Israelis in rare attack at border crossing with Jordan
content: The shooting by a Jordanian gunman at the Allenby Bridge was the deadliest on record at the border crossing. In response, Israel shut down land crossings with Jordan.
summary: The shooting by a Jordanian gunman at the Allenby Bridge was the deadliest on record at the border crossing. In response, Israel shut down land crossings with Jordan.

title: China’s ‘disappeared’ foreign minister demoted to low-level publishing job, say former U.S. officials
content: Qin Gang, an aggressive “wolf warrior” diplomat, had a meteoric rise and an even faster fall from grace. He’s now said to be taking a salary at a Beijing state-run bookseller.
summary: Qin Gang, an aggressive “wolf warrior” diplomat, had a meteoric rise and an even faster fall from grace. He’s now said to be taking a salary at a Beijing state-run bookseller.

title: They promised to stop practicing female cutting. This sleuth makes sure.
content: Momodou Keita is back on patrol after his work triggered a debate over female genital mutilation that convulsed Gambia and drew broad international attention.
summary: Momodou Keita is back on patrol after his work triggered a debate over female genital mutilation that convulsed Gambia and drew broad international attention.

title: Russia throttles YouTube, popular with kids, celebrities and dissidents
content: Russia is cracking down on alternative sources of information, especially online, and is pushing citizens away from foreign-based social media apps.
summary: Russia is cracking down on alternative sources of information, especially online, and is pushing citizens away from foreign-based social media apps.

title: Typhoon Yagi leaves four dead, dozens injured in Vietnam
content: The “super typhoon” shuttered airports and wreaked havoc on roads in Hanoi and surrounding areas in northern Vietnam.
summary: The “super typhoon” shuttered airports and wreaked havoc on roads in Hanoi and surrounding areas in northern Vietnam.

title: Palestinians interview witnesses to U.S. woman’s West Bank killing
content: Two witnesses said Aysenur Eygi, 26, was shot in the head by Israeli forces. Eyewitnesses said evidence gathering was underway after Eygi’s death.
summary: Two witnesses said Aysenur Eygi, 26, was shot in the head by Israeli forces. Eyewitnesses said evidence gathering was underway after Eygi’s death.

title: CIA chief says Ukraine’s incursion into Russia unnerved Moscow elites
content: CIA Director William J. Burns made the remarks Saturday during a rare public appearance with his British counterpart, Richard Moore, in London.
summary: CIA Director William J. Burns made the remarks Saturday during a rare public appearance with his British counterpart, Richard Moore, in London.

title: Paris to name sports venue in honor of slain Olympian Rebecca Cheptegei
content: The Ugandan marathoner was set on fire in Kenya by her ex-partner, police allege. “Paris will not forget her,” its mayor said, according to AFP.
summary: The Ugandan marathoner was set on fire in Kenya by her ex-partner, police allege. “Paris will not forget her,” its mayor said, according to AFP.

title: Ukraine’s Kursk incursion already has its own museum exhibit in Kyiv
content: The museum director crossed into Russia days after Ukrainian troops and brought back a haul of items to portray a “picture of the war.”
summary: The museum director crossed into Russia days after Ukrainian troops and brought back a haul of items to portray a “picture of the war.”
